result.execSummary:
The defendant Donald L Counter was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Robbery with Use of Force, a class E felony, Wisconsin Statutes 943.32(1)(a).

Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

miscConds.notes:
BAIL APPLIED TO RESTITUTION.
$2,056.99 payable to Kral Scrap Metal and $1,150.00 to Petro Mart. (for a total of $3,206.99)
(Petro Mart was joint and several with co-defendants Antonio Crivello and Dontrell Walls) along with surcharges.

AS OF 6/10/2016: BAIL MONEY TO BE REMOVED FROM RESTITUTION. COURT DIDN'T ORDER IT TO BE APPLIED. REFUND MONEY TO POSTER.
BAIL APPLIED TO COSTS AND DNA SURCHARGE. Refund remaining bail to poster.
Maintain full time employment and/or school.
Submit to an AODA Assessment and follow through with any treatment recommended.

Maintain absolute sobriety.
Submit to random alcohol/drug screens.
Not to use or possess of alcohol or controlled substances without a valid prescription or any drug paraphernalia.
Any valid prescription drugs must be taken only in the manner in which they are prescribed.
Inform Agent of all prescriptions.
Follow through with any treatment/counseling recommended.
Provide DNA sample if not previously done.
No contact with with victims, Loomis Petro Mart and Kral Scrap Metal.
Write a letter of apology to the victim, A.P.

timeConds.notes:
Condition Time - First 3 months STRAIGHT TIME and remainder of 9 months to be served in Huber. (nonworking hours) Standard Release.
6 months Day Report Center to be served consecutive to Condition Time
10-07-2016 - Court orders defendant's jail sentence stayed for (8) days commencing October 7, 2016.
